description.narrative: O3b Networks Ltd. is a greenfield project company to manufacture, launch and operate a Medium Earth Orbital (MEO) Ka-band satellite constellation that will provide broadband connectivity and backbone services to emerging markets worldwide. Thanks the satellites proximity to earth, its innovative steerable spot beams and its equatorial orbit O3b will provide high quality, low cost internet connectivity at any location between 45 degrees latitude North and South.

name.narrative: O3b Networks Ltd. is legally incorporated in Jersey, the Channel Islands. The manufacture of the satellites will be undertaken under a sub-contract with Thales (France) and the launch under a sub-contract with Arianespace (European Space Agency). Ground operations for satellite and network operations will be located in Luxembourg (at SES headquarters) and at various locations in the USA. A worldwide network of 8 teleport sites will guarantee uninterrupted control of the satellite fleet while providing terrestrial links to the global internet infrastructure.
